meanings.definition: To fill or repair with grout.
meanings.sent1: I grouted the tiles in the bathroom to make them stick properly.
meanings.sent2: The workers grouted the bricks to secure them in place.
meanings.sent3: The chef grouted the cracks in the cake with frosting to hide them.
meanings.sent4: She grouted her heart with love to mend the broken pieces.
meanings.sent5: The gardener grouted the soil around the plants to keep them stable.

meanings.sent1: The grouted floor looked neat and tidy in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The grouted walls in the shower prevented water leakage.
meanings.sent3: The grouted sidewalk felt rough under my feet as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her grouted shoes seemed to blend in with the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The grouted pathway sparkled in the sunlight after the rain.
